metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8116 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
The ELF parser (readelf.c) in file before 5.21 allows remote attackers tocause a denial of service (CPU consumption or crash) via a large number of(1) program or (2) section headers or (3) invalid capabilities.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-8116` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

file - 1:5.14-2ubuntu3.3
libmagic1 - 1:5.14-2ubuntu3.3
python-magic - 1:5.14-2ubuntu3.3
python3-magic - 1:5.14-2ubuntu3.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: file package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:5.14-2ubuntu3.3').
